title: Document Mistakes List
body_html:
We are translating the official documents to Chinese. In this progress, we find some mistake in the official documents, so list as below. Welcome to add some mistake you find in the documents.
Formate: checkbox+document address+mistake detail

  • avg_pool3d, the kt should be dt
  • avg_pool2d, the explanation of parameters ceil_mode and count_include_pad cannot be understanding.
body_text:
We are translating the official documents to Chinese. In this progress, we find some mistake in the official documents, so list as below. Welcome to add some mistake you find in the documents.
Formate: checkbox+document address+mistake detail

 avg_pool3d,  the kt should be dt
 avg_pool2d,  the explanation of parameters ceil_mode and count_include_pad cannot be understanding.
body:
We are translating the official documents to Chinese. In this progress, we find some mistake in the official documents, so list as below. Welcome to add some mistake you find in the documents.
**Formate: checkbox+document address+mistake detail**

- [x] [avg_pool3d](http://pytorch.org/docs/nn.html#avg-pool3d1),  the `kt` should be `dt`
- [x] [avg_pool2d](http://pytorch.org/docs/nn.html#avg-pool2d1),  the explanation of parameters `ceil_mode` and `count_include_pad` cannot be understanding.
